parameters: Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Sorry, I'm a little busy at the moment.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
Gale_DefaultPNG
\n<Gale>Awoo. Excuse us. We're coming in.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Oh, this mana signature... Yes, you are indeed
a dragon. I thought you were a dragonkin at first, but
that is definitely pure dragon mana even though its
shape has been altered.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>You must be the one who helped with the slime
research quest. Come on in. I can make some time for
you.
Gale_HappyPNG
\n<Gale>You're not busy for once?
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>Hey, Gale. That's the Guild Master you're
talking to! She's the one who orders all
us adventurers as well as Ritia and Iora
around.
Gale_ShockedPNG
\n<Gale>But Master, you're the one who told me that...
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Are you talking to Sir Alain? I did end up reading
Ritia's report on your situation, so I'm aware of the
details. I'm willing to assist in whatever way I can.
Gale_HappyPNG
\n<Gale>Oh? Then can you please undo the curse on me
and Master!
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Unfortunately, that is something I cannot do. In
the end, I can only help in a way that follows proper
guild procedures.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>This land may be called Dragon Gate, but the guild
won't break the rules just because of your race. And
besides, dragons flew away from this country three
decades ago.
Gale_ShockedPNG
\n<Gale>Three decades? Is there a reason why?
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>... I can't say. You're a dragon, aren't you? Shouldn't
you know?
Gale_DefaultPNG
\n<Gale>We've only just come to this country, awoo. And there
are a lot of dragon clans out there. We don't really
get into other dragons' business.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I see. That's informative. I did not
know that about the dragon species... Although I guess
I'm not as studious as the historians living in the
village I came from.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>In any case, regarding undoing your curse, we're
currently withholding your earnings from any
investigation quests until you reach the 350,000 G
price that Ritia set for you.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>We'll let you keep any money you take from other
quests because we understand you need some money to
go about your daily life.
Bryn_SmugPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>But honestly, I'm impressed you attracted her enough
for the girl to pay 50,000 G out of her own pocket as
the 'discount' she said she'd give you.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Don't tell her I said that, though. She'll be so
embarrassed, she'll hide away in her nap spot again.
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>You know of Ritia's bad habits and you
still don't correct her?
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>Actually, should I even be complaining
if she was willing to pay to help us out?
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>My half elf ears can pick up Sir Alain's voice, but
it's hard to make out what he's saying.
Bryn_SmugPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>That's a very... muffled location for you to be
riding your dragon, Sir Alain. Was this by your order?
Gale_HappyPNG
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>Believe me, I had no say in this!
Gale_HappyPNG
\n<Gale>I put Master there, myself! It's the safest place
for him! Awoo~!
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I-Is that so...? Well, I was going to scold Sir
Alain, but if you're allowing it, I guess it should be
fine.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Let's make sure innocent souls remain that
way, shall we?
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>I completely agree to keeping Gale's
innocence, but she gave in a little too
quickly there.
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>At the very least, it looks like Gale's
unexpected attitude threw off the Guild
Master's composure.
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>*Cough* Ahem. Well, let's actually get some business
done since you're here, Miss Gale.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'll make a few more quests available for you since
you've proven your ability.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>You weren't allowed to head to Renore Cliffs
along the Northern Road, correct?
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I apologize. Although the Crystal Cavern dungeon
on Mt. Renore that you returned from is there, we had
to make sure your ability in human form was sufficent
for your safety.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Well, you're still not allowed to enter that
dungeon. Sir Alain's permit applied specifically for
him with you as his 'plus one'.
Bryn_AngryPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>He's currently not in a suitable position to use
his permit, so I won't allow it unless you prove your-
self worthy of your own permit, understood?
Gale_ShockedPNG
\n<Gale>Y-Yes, ma'am!
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>(After dealing with Ritia all of the
time, it's surprisingly refreshing to have
someone so strict on the rules.)
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>(It's still a shame that she won't just
uncurse us until we earn enough money, but
I guess that's just how it is.)
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>(I do want Gale to understand that
there's more to adventuring than just
beating up monsters. She's got to learn
some strategy too and this should help.)
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Oh, that's right. There is another investigative
quest that should require both of your skills.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Iora and I are personally paying for it, so
please do accept it when you have the time.
New quests are now available at the main entrance!
Gale_HappyPNG
\nr<Gale>Guild Master, we're back. We accepted her quest.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>So you've spoken to her? Did she tell
you about the demon?
Gale told the Guild Master the location of the demon.
Gale_DefaultPNG
Bryn_ShockedPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>The area behind the elf village? There's a
demon there? How is that even possible? There shouldn't
be a way for even demons to enter uninvited.
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>This is bad. If the Black Ruby isn't contained upon
retrieval, its curses will spread to the shrine and
the elves.
Gale_SadPNG
\n<Gale>She also gave us this strange ring. What is it? I
think we've been picking up a bunch of rings lately.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Oh, an Intention Ring. I was going to loan you
mine, but if she gave you that, I suppose there's no
need.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>As long as you have an Intention Ring, you should
be allowed into the village. You can think of it as
an identification permit for the Lorestian Elves.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>That elf village is home to a lot of... eccentric
people. They're a bit too sedentary for my tastes.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>The village chief is easy-going thankfully, so you
shouldn't have any trouble once you enter the village
because you have the permit.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>... Though I say that, please don't
mention me to her. I left that town to get away from
her in particular. I'm not sure if I like the idea of
her knowing what I'm doing...
Gale_ShockedPNG
\nr<Gale>Awoo? I-Is that so?
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>(More importantly, we elves only carry one ring
because only the chief has more. Why would that hag
give away her own to an adventurer she hardly knows?)
\n<Guild Master Bryn>(I wouldn't mind giving away mine because I'm not
returning, but shouldn't she be concerned?)
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>In any case, I managed to get a proper Sapphire
Seal type barrier. I had to ask Mirie from the magic
shop for a rush order.
Obtained the Sapphire Seal.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
Gale_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>It works by placing at least 5 seals on the demon's
mana points and then activating it.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>You'll likely have to take down the demon first
before you can accomplish that.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Mirie's arranged for some Mini sized seals that should
still work even if Sir Alain uses it, but if he does,
he'd have to be directly on the demon which would be
very risky.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>And it won't kill the demon either. It
can only weaken it enough to buy you some time so get
away afterwards.
Gale_SadPNG
\nr<Gale>I hope Master won't have to do that.
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>Well, knowing our luck - it's going
to happen anyways.
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>In any case, we'll just have to prepare.
I'm happy I have some seals my size to
create that neutralizer.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Good luck, you two. You should be able to
find the way to the elf village in the eastern woods.
Quest 3 Show Objective 2
Quest 3 Show Objective 3
Quest 3 Show Objective 4
Quest 3 Show Objective 5
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Welcome back. I've heard that you completed
a subjugation quest dealing with bandits.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>No need for proof of subjugation. I'm well
aware of the situation on the Northern Road.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Word passes quickly through the merchants'
information network because of how bothersome they
were.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Bryn>You've done well. Congratulations for completing the
quest.
Quest Completed
The bandit hideout along the Northern Road has been
eliminated completely!
Travel has become much safer thanks to your efforts!
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Allow me to give you a suitable reward.
Received 4000 G!
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>By the way, since you've been fighting so much
lately, Miss Gale, perhaps you should get better
equipped.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Relying on runes is one thing, but having enchanted
weaponry and armor would make things easier for an
adventurer.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Since you're a dragon, however, there aren't many
weapons and armor better than your own body.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>But there is a way, actually. Take this.
Obtained Elfin Medicinal Salve! It might be useful if
you run into some forest residents!
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Did you know? Sometimes, residents from the forest visit
our town and they stay at the inn.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Take this to them. Once they smell the scent of the
forest elves, they should will be willing to assist
you.
[Gale's Upgrades]
A 'shop' to improve Gale's claws and equipment is now
available on the second floor of the inn.
Quest Set Completed 11
A
B
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Oh, did you finish a gathering quest?
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Oh, this is Mirie's quest?
Bryn_ShockedPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>That girl always thinks she can get me to hold onto
her alchemic materials.
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Well, I do have to admit that they do work... She is
such an eccentric, though... Especially when it comes
to status ailments...
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Well, nevermind her. Let me get you a reward
for a job well done.
Quest Completed
Wistel Flowers have been picked for Mirie's Magic Shop!
Received 3000 G!
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Speaking of Mirie, we've had a few chats about
Mini before, and she gave me some ideas. I did want to
put Sir Alain's Mini size to good use.
Bryn_SmugPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>... Well, if you're curious, why not check
the quest listings again? It should be fine if you
come across the quest on your own...
Alain only quests have been arranged! When you can
wander around as Alain, check the quest listings!
Quest Set Completed 12
B
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Hello, Miss Gale.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm sorry, I'm a little busy, getting
some things in order at the moment.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Hello, Miss Gale.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm sorry, I'm a little busy, getting
some things in order at the moment.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Hello, Miss Gale.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm sorry, I'm a little busy, getting
some things in order at the moment.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Hello, Miss Gale.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm sorry, I'm a little busy, getting
some things in order at the moment.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Hello, Miss Gale.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm sorry, I'm a little busy, getting
some things in order at the moment.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Hello, Miss Gale.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm sorry, I'm a little busy, getting
some things in order at the moment.
ChainCommand 600 6 z,z,left,right
Gale_HappyPNG
\n<Gale>This is fun!
\v[14] broken barrel destroyed.
\v[15] pile of planks destroyed.
A
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>Hey Gale! It's time to head back
to Iora! You're done!
Gale_ShockedPNG
\n<Gale>Eh? Already? I was having fun breaking things.
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\nr<Alain>(Of course she was... Dragons are
a wild race after all.)
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Hey! Guild Master! Down here! It's me!
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>...Hm? Did I hear something?
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Oh, Sir Alain. So did you accept my quest? You must
be bored, aren't you?
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm grateful. I've been hoping to use your
Mini size for some simple missions... Well, they might
be a bit big for you anyways...
AlainFace
\n<Alain>(She's try to sound like she doesn't care,
but she's clearly happy I came.)
AlainFace
\n<Alain>If it'll pass the time and get me a
reward in the process, I don't mind doing
it.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>While Gale's sleeping, I need to pull my
weight somehow after all.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>There's not a lot of weight to pull at your size,
but I see your point.
Bryn_ShockedPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>If you're really prepared for it, the job you
claimed is for cleaning the chairs over there.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I don't expect you to be able to do much, but if
you can wipe away the dirt, dust, and random junk that
is on them, correct?
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Please take care of this before I have my next
meeting.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Just some chair cleaning? That should
be pretty doable.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>I wonder when her next meeting is going
to be though...
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Hey! Guild Master! Down here! It's me!
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>...Some squeaking on the ground?
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Oh, Sir Alain. So did you accept my quest? You're the
only one to ever be finding those scraps of paper up
front at the entrance.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>You're the only person who'd leave them
there. You clearly were expecting me to
come, weren't you?
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Well, I won't say that I wasn't looking forward to
your arrival.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>You're just the right size for what I have planned for
you today.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>(She's far too happy about me showing up.
It's a little creepy to be honest...)
AlainFace
\n<Alain>If there's a reward, I'm good to go,
Guild Master! Give me whatever you've got!
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Well, today's quest is for you to test out a few
trial ideas I had for the next rank promotion exam for
adventurers.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Could you try and clear a few puzzles that I made to
see if they'll be solvable for rookie adventurers?
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I made some models that'll become life-sized once
I confirm that they're of the appropriate difficulty.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm sure someone of your calibur should be able to
push a few things around even though you've shrunken
down.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm quite pleased with what I made. I worked
really hard to design these. I didn't even have to use
the magic planning tool I got from Mirie's shop.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>I think I can still manage something
from a model. And if you're making it for
the rookies, I just HAVE to help as their
senior in these subjects.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'm happy to hear that. I'll even give
you a piece of candy as an additional reward for your
assistance today then.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>(She's really is in a good mood. She
must really be proud of her puzzle.)
Blackout
BrynHandPNG
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Uwoaaah!
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Now, now. Calm down. I'm simply moving you over to the
puzzle models I made.
Bryn_SmugPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>If you squirm around that much, I might 'accidentally'
drop you, Sir Alain.
BrynHandPNG
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 1);
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>There we go. Welcome to my pain-stakingly created
puzzle boxes.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I plan to have the rookie adventurers run through
these sorts of puzzles to evaluate their intelligence
for going into dungeons.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Having an actual person go through them should make
testing these much easier.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>It makes me quite happy to have a Mini'd adventurer
around. I don't have to make a bigger version and end
up wasting time and money if it turns out to be
an unsolvable puzzle.
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Go ahead, Sir Alain. Give it your best shot. Whenever
you clear one, I'll take you to the next. There are
three of them to go through.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>And if you mess up on a puzzle and want me to
reset it, just let me know by tapping on the walls.
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>You can hit the walls to get my attention, but don't
hit them too hard, okay?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>The Guild Master seems pretty excited
about this. I guess she worked really hard
in making them.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Guess I better take this seriously and
try to clear these boxes for her then!
[Puzzle Boxes Minigame Quest]
Clear the three puzzle boxes!
Interact with (most) walls to reset the puzzles.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Hey! Down here! Guild Master! It's me -
Alain!
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>... Hm? I heard a chirp...
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Oh, Sir Alain. I take it you came because you saw the
quest I wrote down at the entrance?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>I'm probably the only one who'd ever see
them. You'd be in trouble if I never saw
that, right?
Bryn_HappyPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>You certainly think highly of yourself, Sir Alain.
I simply thought that if you wanted to pass the time,
you could give me some minor help.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>And I do mean minor. I'm well aware that you're not
in any state to do any task of actual importance.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Do I have to admit that you're right?
It's hurts my pride a little to have to
agree with you there.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Well, considering the mini-sized quest you accepted
that I wrote down, you're better off throwing out any
pride to begin with, Sir Alain.
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I needed a boot cleaner after all... *sigh*
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Ritia made a mess earlier in the storeroom while
transferring the monster materials to Iora.
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>She didn't even bother cleaning them up before
deciding to take her nap.
Bryn_AngryPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I'll have to teach her a lesson later...
AlainFace
\n<Alain>So I really am cleaning boots, huh?
That's not to difficult of a task, but
couldn't you just get something to wipe
them yourselves?
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Sadly, with the most recent load of paperwork, I
don't have the time to even get some water from the
well out back.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Trust me when I saw that the feeling of slime on
your soles is disgusting. I give you full permission
to go around under my desk.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Full permission, huh? I'm not fond of
cleaning boots, but I've always wanted to
look behind the Guild Master's desk.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Well, this is looking 'under' instead
of behind, but it's close enough.
Bryn_AngryPNG
Eury_AngryPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I told you that the guild does not accept such
requests.
\nr<Elf>All I’m asking for is its Black Ruby. I don't think
I'm demanding much. I even know where it is. I have the
reward money ready as well.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>And I’m telling you that it isn’t possible. The
guild cannot collect such items, nor will it put up
such a commission.
Eury_SeriousPNG
\nr<Elf>Oh? I suppose adventurers only amount to that much
then if you can’t fulfill this one request of mine.
Bryn_AngryPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>It’s a matter of regulations. We refuse to accept
commissions for cursed items due to the danger they
hold to not just the adventurers but also the
townspeople.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>We have enough trouble with cursed items causing
problems for our adventurers, though it doesn't seem
as if you're concerned about that at all.
Eury_SeriousPNG
\n<Elf>Caring about a human settlement? How magnanimous
of you when you've lived here for only a quarter of
the time you've spent with us. But it’s inexcusable to
reject the orders of one of your family, brat.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I’m a half elf who takes pride in her human side.
Besides, I’m half dark-elf and half human. No part of
me is forest-elf, 'Granny' Eury.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Besides, the last letter from the chief told me
that you haven't been back to the village in ages
either.
Eury_AngryPNG
\n<Elf>T-That's... What I do is none of that busybody
woman's business! I have an important job that those
foolish dragon legend historians can't understand!
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Important job? You've just been digging
through ruins for golems again, haven't you? For a
craftswoman, you sure are into old things, you hag.
Eury_AngryPNG
\n<Elf>Hey! Golems are the future! The technology of the
past will help us evolve our current- Wait! That's not
the job I'm talking about! Don't insult my hobby like
that!
Gale_ShockedPNG
\n<Gale>S-Scary… Whats with this pressure.
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Blasted! They’re releasing so much
magic just talking to each other!
Bryn_DefaultPNG
Eury_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>... It seems we have a guest. We can continue
this conversation another time.
Eury_SadPNG
\n<Eury>Tch. I can't wait any longer. They'll get away
if we wait too long! I'm making this request for
Sitri’s sake so give me some priority here!
Bryn_ShockedPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Sitr-?! I already told you before. What you're
trying to do is impossible!
Eury_AngryPNG
\n<Eury>... It’s not impossible! That ruby’s all I need left!
If you won’t help, I’ll just get it a different way!
Bryn_SadPNG
Gale_ShockedPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Sorry you had to see that. Was our argument
so loud that you two got worried?
\n<Guild Master Bryn>That old ha- Eury and I have some history
with each other, but it’s nothing to worry about.
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\n<Alain>She doesn't have to worry about us
being nosy. I’m less interested in a family
squabble and more in that request. That
Black Ruby in particular.
\n<Gale>Awoo? Master, what’s so special about a Black Ruby?
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>So Sir Alain heard as well. I suppose I can explain
it to make up for frightening you.
Gale_DefaultPNG
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>To begin with, that Black Ruby that she wanted, I'll
explain what that is.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>It’s something demons possess - a crystalization of
their energy. Demonic power is cursed to non-demonic
beings so it is highly dangerous.
Gale_DefaultPNG
\n<Gale>Awoo? Cursed? Then couldn’t the guild purify it like
they would to our rings?
Bryn_DefaultPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>No, Black Rubies continuously release the cursed
energy upon removal unless the demon seals the power
themselves, and there's no way we could convince one
to do that.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>It must be sealed on the spot or
else the cursed power would harm innocent victims
during transport.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>That's why we'll need a special tool in order to do
so - a Sapphire Seal designed to use the demon's
own mana to counter the energy from Black Rubies and
neutralize it.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>A neutralized Black Ruby is considered safe.
Additionally, it can be crafted into a strong curse
deterrent in the right hands as it can dominate curses.
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>As valuable as that sounds, though,
they're held by demons - the ones classified as a high
level threat because they’re cunning, unpredictable,
and masters of magic.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>You'd have to be a physical powerhouse
to be able to overwhelm a demon. They're beings with a
lot of mana and plenty of magical defenses.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>It's actually a little frightening to know that
she discovered the location of a demon.
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\n<Alain>So we're trying to swipe a gem from a demon?

\n<Guild Master Bryn>She's a... friend... Back when I stayed with those

\n<Guild Master Bryn>Sadly, she wandered outside of the
forest boundaries and...
Gale_ShockedPNG

Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Miss Gale, Sir Alain. This may be a little selfish,
and I’m sorry to ask this of you, but would you take
up an unofficial request?
\n<Gale>Us?
MagnifyingGlass
AlainFace
\n<Alain>So she's willing to go that far, huh?
Unofficial requests aren't uncommon, but
isn't asking an inexperienced adventurer
like Gale reckless?
Bryn_SadPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>I apologize. I'll take full responsibility if
things go wrong, but now that you two have met her, I
would like you to deal with Granny Eury.
Bryn_SeriousPNG
\n<Guild Master Bryn>That woman doesn't care for the safety of
others outside of those who are important to her, so
she will be even more reckless if she hasn't been
already.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>Leaving the investigation and collection of
the demon's Black Ruby to you two would be a much
safer option.
\n<Guild Master Bryn>While the safest option would still be to stop her, I
do wish for her success. Please go see her. I will match
the fee Eury offered for the quest.

\n<Gale>Awoo. Excuse us, Guild Master. We're here about the

front desk unless she's on break, so I was hoping I
could get somebody to assist me while I'm stuck here.
